carousel_slide1_title: Engineering and Technology for the Modern Industry
carousel_slide1_text: Since 1985, ISF SAC has provided solutions in industrial refrigeration, oil-hydraulics, and automation for key sectors such as fishing, mining, and food.
carousel_slide2_text: ISF SAC is synonymous with experience and commitment, present in Peru, Ecuador, and Panama, supporting industries that never stop.
carousel_slide3_text: We provide maintenance, spare parts, and turnkey projects with permanent attention 24/7, 365 days a year.
